title: Facebook failed to warn users of known risks before 2018 breach: court filing
text: Facebook  users suing the world's largest social media network over a 2018 data breach say it failed to warn them about risks tied to its single sign-on tool, even though it protected its employees, a court filing on Thursday showed.

title: Facebook loses the last co-founder from its most important acquisitions

title: Facebook is losing its last Oculus co-founder
text: Facebook spent billions on Oculus in 2014, and in the years since, the organization has been absorbed deeper into Facebook while the startup’s co-founders have stepped back in prominence. Today, the final Oculus co-founder remaining at Facebook, Nate Mitchell, announced he was leaving the company in an internal memo sent to employees.

title: Facebook Inc (FB) COB and CEO Mark Zuckerberg Sold $25.1 million of Shares

title: Facebook’s AR dev toolkit exits closed beta on Instagram
text: Not one to let Face App and Snapchat steal its spotlight, Facebook announced today that it’s opening its closed beta of Spark AR on Instagram, letting any developer build and share an augmented reality filter on the platform. The company announced this change was coming at its F8 keynote earlier this year.

text: Facebook Inc. is offering news outlets millions of dollars for the rights to put their content in a news section that the company hopes to launch later this year, according to people familiar with the matter.

title: Facebook loses facial recognition technology appeal, must face class action
text: A federal appeals court on Thursday rejected Facebook Inc’s (FB.O) effort to undo a class action lawsuit claiming that it illegally collected and stored biometric data for millions of users without their consent.
